scripts.start: npm run Develop/client:build && npm run Develop/server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run Develop/server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run Develop/client:dev"
scripts.install: cd Develop/server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.client:build: cd Develop/client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.build: cd Develop/client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
